definition: weak/feeble/young/inferior/(following a decimal or fraction) slightly less than

sentences.english: At first, no one would publish his work because of his experimental formats, but he was determined to continue writing anyway, for his own fulfillment.
sentences.chinese: 他的许多作品都是从一个弱智儿童的眼光来叙述的。

sentences.english: Adaptation is a normal process of growth among children with intellectual disability and determines their level and quality in authentic life.
sentences.chinese: 适应是弱智儿童成长发展的基本形式和趋势。

sentences.english: , which we're assuming taught him the importance of not giving your book a retarded title.
sentences.chinese: ，我猜这教他懂得了避免给书起个弱智名字的重要性。

sentences.english: The child was born a half-wit.
sentences.chinese: 这个小孩生下来就是个弱智者。

sentences.english: Most children with Down syndrome have mild-to-moderate mental retardation.
sentences.chinese: 大多数唐氏综合症儿童有轻度到中度的弱智。

sentences.english: Special activity is designed in the hospital to meet the needs of subnormal .
sentences.chinese: 医院为满足弱智者的需要而设计了特殊的活动。

sentences.english: Soon the whole hillside was one gigantic, seething, cretin, mongolian and pinhead orgy.
sentences.chinese: 不久整个山腰都沸腾了，白痴，弱智，畸形一起狂欢。

sentences.english: For the child, music is an important approach to realize art education.
sentences.chinese: 音乐对弱智儿童来说，是实施美育的重要手段之一。

sentences.english: Neuropathy people think wide, mentally retarded children more than joy .
sentences.chinese: 神经病人思维广，弱智儿童欢乐多。

sentences.english: This always can perceive my feebleminded bar.
sentences.chinese: 这总可以看出我弱智吧。

sentences.english: I realise the question sounds moronic.
sentences.chinese: 我意识到这个问题听起来很弱智。

sentences.english: Idiot when your teacher can mentally retarded people can teach you to say the words .
sentences.chinese: 白痴当你的老师能弱智人可以教你说的话。

sentences.english: This school is calculated for retarded children.
sentences.chinese: 这所学校是为弱智儿童开办的。

sentences.english: I am discovered self is more and more feebleminded.
sentences.chinese: 我发现自己越来越弱智了。

sentences.english: Idiots and other incompetents need someone to look after them.
sentences.chinese: 白痴和其它弱智者需人照料他们。

sentences.english: How do the deaf-mutes and the mentally disabled dream?
sentences.chinese: 聋哑人和弱智者怎样做梦？

definition: stupid/sluggish/clumsy/to wiggle (of worms)/to move in a disorderly fashion
to short-circuit/(fig.) to have a mental lapse/to get one's wires crossed/to be addled
erhua variant of 缺心眼[que1 xin1 yan3]
